Blog.post: i met my father's fren..n i called him "ah chun uncle" in hokien la..he was a real ganster in malaysia..he does not look like 1 of the ganster on the street..those ganster in singapore..swings their hands high around as if the street is own by them..those r just a small type so scared die ganster..not real..they onli noe how 2 bully ppl tat is smaller..ah chun uncle is the best ganster i ever meet..he played wif mi..he bring mi around malaysia on his bike..he does not bully ppl..he becum a ganster 4 MONEY..these kind of ganster we ppl called him..fight 4 money ganster in hokien..he has lots of brothers..every new year..his brothers will cum 2 his house 4 dinner..just to pay a visit to him..cool man..in malaysia a village called pantai..is like some how own by him..everybody there respect him..my father told mi..he becum a respectable ganster becuz he dare to take risk..he is not afraid to die..n this kind is the real ganster..i really cant see tat he is a ganster..he doesnt have any tatoos on him..does not act like 1..but when i saw him fight in malaysia..HOLY SHIT!!! he looked dame firece n he got blood all over his body..oh gosh..at tat time i addmit i was afraid..hahas..actually..my father was also a ganster in the past..haix..shh dun tell any1..he also has been closed be4..but he has changed over a new live..but i noe he still have those gansters frens..hahas..i 2 noe some thing?? tat happened on my father n mother's weddin..some stupid small ganster came to interupt the weddin..n becuz at tat time my father's frens(were also ganster at tat time) were also there n there is lots of them..un the end..my father n his frens beat till those stupid ganster very cham..hahas..my mother was so stupid..ran around like idiot when they fought..hahas..so funny...now i dun respect the ah chun uncle anymore..cuz he takes drugs n was closed in jail now..he is cumin out on nov..many of his buddies left him too..cuz he takes drugs..so stupid..! haix..too bad lor..but he last time was so cool n well respected by everyone in the village..tat y i m not afraid of any of the ganster in singapore..they all r onli actin tough outside..actually they r all scaredy cats..my father told mi..if anyones bullied mi..fight back..even if i lose..someone will take care of it..but u noe lahz..i so friendly n kind where got ppl will cum bully mi 1..wahahas..mi often joke alot..ever show u the real mi..i changed..i'm no longer the old haoyee in the past..in the past i m bad n violent..n i can tell u..all my couin were afraid of mi..after i entered sec school..i changed..changed alot..i no longer gets angry so easily..n i no lnger any how beats ppl up..wahahas..maybe 1 day..u will see the past mi again..when ppl bully mi lahz..see 1st lahz..wahahahs..but..i'm fair...

haix..just read all ppl's de blog..cuz dame bored..all also sad sad de thing..everyone also say wat dun 1 2 live..hahas..dun noe wat the hack they r thinkin..there r more ppl more cham then u all lahz...all onli noe how 2 act cham..y cant they try 2 live happier..? hahas..if they r moody..then try make themself happier lahz..like mi..wahahas..shhh..cant how lian..hahas..but mi some times also bo liao lahz..hahas..say jokes let ownself happy..like siao like tat..hahas..but nvm..as long as i m happy..wahahas..but who noes..maybe in my heart there r things tat i cant say out..but if i'm not happy..try makin others happy when they r wif mi..wahahas...(good hor??) hahas..everything changed when i reached home..dun noe y leh..haix..so i hate 2 stay at home..hahas..nvm lahz..so late le..wonder if she sleep le mahz..? erm..think so bax..cuz think she is tired of the performace bax..kkz..rest well worz..scarly still got chance 2 meet lin wei in ur dreams..hahas..so good...maybe i also got chance meet the pink bag ger..hahas..just kiddin..tat 1 is mathew 1..wahahas..haix..think 2moro will be kept at home again bax..lookin at the monkey again..dun noe y leh..like got "zi bi" like tat..hahas..then jiu thought of the past again..siao liao..erm..try not 2 think so much le..hahas..dun noe vin got his present le mahz..if not..think must make him open his present in front of the class..wahahas..so funny..i'm sure every one will got a chance 2 laugh le..hehez..(cia..rest well worz.. :p...hahas..lookin forward 4 vin 2 recive his surprise present..)

2day was dame bored..so weet mat at least got ppl pei..think she is buzy wif her things now bax..the concert..anyway..ur concert still fine mahx...? good luck... hope u didnt spoil everything..hahas..just kiddin..saw ur lin wei liao..then happy lahz..hahas..went hougang mall wif mat..just the 2 of us(dun jealous worz)..like gays leh...hahas..but thanx mat..thanx 4 ur accompany..hahas...then went to play arcard..quite..borin cuz mi dun like 2 play games lahz..always lose 2 mathew de..hahas..stupid..then went pizzar hut 2 eat..wahahas..althought i dun feel like eatin..but mat 1 2 eat..so must pei him lor..stupid waste my $$..order liao then never eat much..hahas.nvm lahz..happy jiu hao..after that..went mat's house watch vcd..wow..nice show..ate dinner there..reached homw abt 9+...at least it helped mi spend the day faster..actually i wanted 2 go 2 the concert n help..cuz can see her..but now no point le..hahas..nvm lahz..also good mahz..then mi wun be so tired liao..whahahas..haix..kkz..on the way home suddenly thought of the 1st time i send her home..opps..k lahz..dun tok abt this liao..kao..i thought 2day was sunday..hahas..then mat told mi is sat..haix.. actually 1 2 watch the "ru hua" show 2 cheer mi up a litter..but it is showin at sunday so dun have lor..hahas..nvm lahz..(mat thanx..! n cia cia.hope u have great fun in ur concert bax..hehez..good luck..!)

2day..didnt tok much to her..cuz like..nvm..but i really did try 2 tok to her..then she say is i dun 1 tok de..? 2day..i'm the one who tok 2 u 1st k..u'r the one who didnt 1 2 tok 2 mi..erm..guess..in the end we'r fine le bax..she ask mi y 2day like tat? erm..how should i say..? 2day i have any changes meh? like i once ask u y u changed rite? but u say nothing..in the end i finally found out y u changed.. becuz u fall in love wif another guy..i didnt angry or didnt tok 2 u..i still wish u good luck n tok 2 u..hehez..suddenly thought of yesterday how we play those stupid games..scissors,paper,stone..hahas..cute aww..hahas..hope next time ur lin wei can pei u play bax..hahas..dun bully him hor..ltr he dun 1 u..wahahas..u said tat 1 2 keep a distance from mi..now u get wat u 1 le bax..hope now mi wun be irritatin u..hahas..hor?? some question i asked yesterday..sorri..dun bother 2 think about it le lahz..k? just carry on wif ur live lahz..hahas..think i noe the ans u would give le..anyway..2day after school go to compass cuz need 2 buy present 4 vincent..wahahas...stupid..actually buyin the cup support 1 ( the one tat support the cork) hahahas...then in the end buy him a sexy under wear..hahas..so funny..made amas to pay 4 us..hahas..(cia..i tried 2 take things easy after i read wat u wrote..hehez..so dun worry about mi lahz k..just cary on wif ur life..if u n lin wei got any progress must tell mi wors..hahas..k lahz..dun make u pa sei liao..hahas..if u 1 2 keep a distance from mi..just tell mi kaz..all the best to u lahz..*hugS*

erm..read wat she wrote bax..think tats better 4 her bax..after i noe..think she also some how relive le bax..was happy 2day at 1st..but after i read..not too le..think everything will be in my memorys 4ever bax..*so sad* hope u happy wif him.. erm..dun noe wat 2 say le..think not gonna write my blog 4 a long time le..n cia..dun need help mi put tag board le..thanks 4 everything lahz..dun worry i'm fine..dun 1 any pity wors..just treat mi as normal jiu ok le.. :) ..think i also cant always cling onto mat bax..mat..cia..good luck 2 both of u..2 also tryin 2 go after someone rite? erm..k lahz..finish here..my last good bye le..

I will always be the 1st one who cheers u up when ever we "quarral" 4 small matters..haix..in the end..i will be the one who's at fault..all this just 2 make her not angry..make her feel better..but cia..every time i "bo chap" u surlly got some thing de..2day..u'r the 1st person who like bu shuang wif mi rite? think u see mi make other ppl then felt bu shuang wif mi ba..after tat i stopped..cuz noe some one is already bu shuang wif mi..so i just never tok 2 u 2day..sorri..haix..but when i talked 2 u after IPW lesson..u like dun hack 2 listen..rite?? cuz u angry wif mi 4 some thing ba..u tell joelyn de thing..mi never blame u or shout at u..mi tok 2 u nicely..mi not angry becuz u tell joelyn..haiz..is i'm sad tat u lied 2 mi tat u never say..if u tell joelyn le..then tell mi u told her..mi wun be angry 2 u de..haix..then u jiu suddenly shout at mi "SORRY LAH" haix..sorri if i make u angry again..i'll stop irritatin u le..i noe always i call u..some times u were reluctan 2 ans my phone call..maybe u'r busy ba..n always 1 u 2 pei mi take mrt..maybe its really a puishment 2 u bax..think wun contiune punishing u again le..mi where "ren xin" 2 punish u again..hehez..anyway sorri 2 bother u..haix..but i 2day still manage 2 see ur reharse..ur reharse end at about 3.30 rite? saw u..u noe y my scout call mi go help i will go? u thought i so helpful de meh..? cuz i noe u got go..i noe u got performin so mi cai accpect 2 help..i go just 2 see u..nvm lahz..doesn't matter any more..hahas..i noe maybe u think i'm stupid bax..n dun think if i was there u would do the same thing..nvm..maybe not going 2 help le..after ur reharse everyone was gone..so took the bus alone home..i noe i'm not ur who..but i envious how u treat stanley..haix..opps..4get..i noe i'm not ur who..so doesn't hope 4 too much..haix..still like lin wei huh..? hehez..all i could do is wish u..good luck..u got the rite 2 go after who u really like.. :) ..k lahz..u still got a high chance..hehez..haix..bye..( erm..go 4 who u like bax.."jia you"..remember.. i will always be there 4 u de..if u dun mind..u can call mi n tell mi ur troubles k?)

wow..i so kuai..so early jiu reach home..wasnt happy 2day..hahas..dame tired was fallin asleep in lit lesson..hahas..but..at least got 2 tok n play wif her..wow..stupid cia..beat mi till so pain..then never cum ask mi pain mah..not caring de..hahas.. but nvm lahz..i also hited u once..but at least i got ask if u'r alrite k..hahas..k lah..anyway..sorri..! hahas..2day the zhi chen keep on findin u then u hide..hahas.. bo liao.. tell mi not 2 find u if u dun like him laz..hahas..n i tricked u n poked u wif a needle..felt guilty later..pai sei leh..hahas..sorri again..kkz..next time mi wun make u again liao..hahas..when i going home tat actually 1 2 say bye bye 2 u..but dun have the chance 2 tell u cuz u was like so busy so didnt 1 2 distract u..anyway onli bye bye 2 words nia..to u mayb it doesnt mean much..hahas..hor..? good lor..hahas..jkjk..went 2 school u didnt dare sit the same place wif u cuz so many of ur frens were there..i noe u surlly didnt 1 2 sit wif mi at tat time rite?? hahas..nvm lahz..can understan u..(sian..will i be back so early every time? dun 1 lahz..so sian..alone at home..haix..)

wah..heard wat joelyn say..abt wat hui min said..hahas..y m i also been fooled..i always treat the person good then they like..hahas..nvm..she always unhappy..mi also will go console her abit..althought wat yuan lin say (n others)..they all dun like her..cuz she is dame irritatin..but mi still make frens wif her..she betrayed mi once..like send my n hers conversation around..but mi 4give her..didnt even scold her kaz..tried 2 trust her again..hahas..maybe all the while i'm been fooled..maybe all the conversation wif her..she send 2 stanley le..fine fine..last time..in my mind..she is irritating onli..but now..hahas..she is an irritatin backstabber..hahas..never..never..!!! gonna trust her again..never gonna tok 2 her again..gonna..treat her as transparent..dame pissed off..sorri but have 2 scold le..cant not kahan any more..FUKER IDIOT CHAO CHEE BYE!!! phew..feelin better..hahas...pai sei pai sei..tokin 2 mat rite now..wah even he also noe liao..hahas..anymind..think if she continue this way..more ppl will hate u bax..hope u good luck..u'r the 1 who make our firendship broke..hahas..anyway.. hope u will make more frens bax..hahas..(very hard ar)..wahahas...min ar..haiz.. no wonder so many ppl dun like u..next time dun need cum act pity n cry infront of mi liao..hard 2 face u next time..n dun wish 2 face u anymore..i will avoid u from now on..cia cia..sorri 4 2day..think i have wrong u 4 tellin others my blog bax..but have u ever tell others be4?? i angry wif u not becuz u tell others u noe?? i angry becuz i think u bluff mi tat u never tell others..if u tell mi u tell other ppl..mostly i will onli kidd wif u nia..but i dun like u 2 bluff mi..kk? hahas..u say u never tell then jiu belive u lorz..very good hor?? see so trust u...hahas..but in the end we still ok rite? hui min say i like a dog followin u every where..hahas..dun care how others think..but..still thinkin of wat she said..wat do u think lehz..? i just wanted 2 have more time wif u onli..nvm liao..think..haix..u also will have more fun wifout mi bax..see u 2day sian sian 1 (when u tok 2 mi..but not other ppl..hahas) tried 2 ask u..u said tat u were tried..maybe bax..2day actually wanted 2 go koven wif u..wif boon teng..hahas..but think after wat hui min say..dun dare le..if u ask mi if i wanted 2 go..i will surlly go de..but if u didnt ask..think u also dun think tat there's a need 4 mi 2 go there bax..rite?? so hope u find ur own happy time..hehez.. :P ..joel got go mahz..? fun mahz..? hahas..wish 2 noe how u spend ur day..must tell mi wors.. :D..mi neh..? wat have i done?? erm..walkin alone on the street..saw ppl from ponggol sec playin soccer in the cage..so join them..even if i dun noe them..cuz at least it can help mi spend my day faster..after awhile..stanley they all came..then they occupate the cage..so i just walk off quietly..no 1 notice..even if they notice..think they dun even 1 2 bother le..hehez..nobody loves mi..so i must love myself more.. :p dun jealous wors..hahas..kkz..tat's mi..even if i'm sad..i wun show out de..then walk n walk..jiu reached wei jei house..suddenly thought of my projects haven complete yet..so jiu went up 2 complete it..at last..at abt 4+ i completed it.wahahas..so satified.. hahas..then suddenly thought of her..wonder wat is she doin now..? but think she wun have the time 2 think of mi bax..hor?? hahas..onli have time think of stanley n lin wei..hahas..dun angry worz..its the truth..wahhas..k lah..ltr u "ham dam" mi..hahas..saw her play wif mathew so happy..hahas..cutez worz..hahas..just kiddin lahz..where will cute de..? wahahas..at least mathew got 2 make her smile again..mathew..meetin IRC gers again hor?? wahahas..call mi go rite?? kkz..tell mi the time when u n her decide liao..see i so good horz? pei u go..if ulgy then puke 2gether..if pretty wish u good luck..hahas.. (cia..thinkin of u every min..wishin i were there..but it it seems impossible..maybe u think i'm tokin cork here bax..:p.. mat good luck.. :D..hugs! cia..erm..erm..erm..hahas..nvm..mucks!! hehez.. :$

Last entry be4 i go sleep le..promise myself 2 study hard..promise cia tat i will study hard..will i..? hope i will bax..really 1 2 put in effort in studys..actually i'm really litter bit like stanley..1 2 work hard but i noe..many ppl around us will look down on us..so must prove 2 them..always tell yao zhong i 1 2 study tat time he will like say.."u will study de meh..?" wah..must prove them wrong..anyway.. mathew..noe u will be seein my blog..so u must also work hard from noe worz..dun let ppl look down on u too..dun play 2 much com le lahz..wear spect or contact lens very mah huan de..like tat de u cai suai wors..anyway going school myself 2moro..hahas..cuz..nvm..erm..going sleep le..good nitez..! buai..(hope i can really study hard bax..hope so..anyway cia already say will help liao hor?? will u..?? hahas..)

hahas..mat , cia..now u 2 dun need be so sad le..cuz ur darling stan..not going 2 transfer school..wahahas..actually i kindd of happy too lahz..really..i'm happy cuz u 2 r happy..hahas..guess u 2 r happy cuz he is not transferin school bax..but i'm like being fooled..hahas..sad 4 nothin..hohoho..was he gainin pity..? erm..i noe i should say tat but..hahas..oopps..ShHhHh..later ppl bu shuang wif mi..hahas k lahz..2day was very bored..waitin 4 SOMEONE 2 msg mi... wahahas..cuz she dun have hp i dun noe 2 msg where..hahas..nvm think she is havin fun now ba..SIANX..hhehez..anyway..cia..pai sei but can u elp mi do another time the tag board..? hahas..pai sei lahz..hahas...oies..n can must tell mi ur memorys hor..! on u n lin wei de..hahas..cuz i too bo liao now...erm..erm..erm.. hahas..sian..erm..when i thought my wallet is not wif mi..the 1st think i think of is the pictures in my wallet..cuz inside got u 2 mahz..so sreach in the dustbin cuz i noe if some1 would take the wallet..they will onli take the money..so the maybe throw the rest in2 dustbin..yucks..still cant find..in the end..i cai noe is in kang yue bag..hahas..stupid..was happy..see i so treasure it kaz...good horz..? hahas.. siao siao..but nvm lahz..all in memorys nia..hahas..erm..findin someone 2 tok 2..findin accompany..findin..U..hahas..u still not feelin well rite..? always tell mi u'r going blind..hahas..dun worry lah..wun de lahz..even if u blind..er...hahas.. told u be4 le..hahas.. :p ..i try not 2 think of u too much..always hope u 2 pei mi..hahas..but very hard..noe u wun have the time..dun noe leh..maybe this how it feel 2 like some1...? hahas..think u have this feelin on stan be4 ba..after wat stan did 2 u..think u also tired of this kind of things le..rite? wahhahas...so maybe u tired of this kind of feelin so now wun feel anything le ba..hahas...but mi will leh..how?? hehez..mathew leh..? u will have this kind of feelin be4 mahz..? on debbie ar?? or u dun have be4..? haix..nvm lahz..mat u so suai..surlly many gers want u de..wahahas..hor?? next time mi pei u go see choi bu..kkz? help u get 1..then u will got this feelin le..then next time ur gf also will have this feelin 4 u..then u will very happy de...wahahas..mat..1 2 transfer 2 ponggol sec..? if u 1 must tell mi horz..hahas..maybe i transfer wif u..wahahas...just kiddin..but anyway really hope u will have 1..er..have GF..wahahas..next time u go blind date again must call mi go hor..can?? then mi give my comments 2 u..hahas..then maybe i have the luck 2 call cia go help u see also..hahas..kkz? maybe bax..or mi go wif u also can cuz dun think cia wants...hahas..always go IRC hor?? kei siao..hahahs..inside de gers all surlly very ugly de..hahas..heard from u tat not even 1 is pretty rite?? hahas..pervert..hehez..cia..u leh..? got saw any suai ger?? got handsome 1 mahz?? must tell mi if u see 1 wors..hahas..then u better share wif mi ur memorys kz..on u n lin wei 1..call mi.. :D then tell mi..wahahas..if u dun 1 say then..GOOD LORZ...hahahaas...kkz lahz..think u will surlly tell mi de rite...? nvm if u dun say then mi jiu make till u say..wahahas...it's good 2 have wonderful memorys..hehez..my memorys..is when i'm wif u..n mat..n i will remember them de..u too..! dun u ever dare 2 4get..! wahahas..sian..now u not at home no 1 pei mi tok..bleax..good..! hahas..just kiddin..have a nice day..! both of u.. (mat quickly find 1 partner..n cia..dun 4get the wonderful times worz..! :D )

Now i noe le..he didnt intent 2 change school after all..! is he gainin pity from ppl so tat he say he is changin school? haiz..nvm lahz..hahas..anyway now he got wat he wants le..hope he really hapy now..hahas..now..i'm the stupid one who sad becuz he is leavin..hohoho..hhahas..fine..nvm lahz..tok 2 cia yesterday..wow..she sound rather sian while tokin 2 mi..nvm..i say she change le..have she?? or m i too suspious le?? think is my fault bax..sorri..! hahas..nvm..cuz i noe 1 day she will surlly..er-hrm..hahas..nvm..hope she find her own happiness bax..hehehz..maybe i m the one who change..hahas...ya..i think i change too..oh..no..! but i will change myself bax..think cant go back 2 the past le bax..when she is happy 2 recive my msg..n i m happy 2 reply her's..so sweet horz..? hahas..but now..neh? hahas..think she dun feel like replyin bax..nvm..hahas..also not her who..dun expect her 2 reply everything..hahas..bleax..or maybe she has fallen 4 another guy?? hahas..then onli can hope she is happy bax..wahahas..good horz? hahas..yesterday asked her whether she can go out..hahas..stupid early noe ans le still ask..but at least got a chance mahz..hahas..clever hor..?? just tryin my luck nia..hahas..every time i stayed back in class just 2 spend a few mins wif her..cuz onli at tat time i got 2 be wif her..got 2 play wif her..got 2..hahas..see her smiles..hahas..but when we were going off..she just say bye n turn off like tat..didnt even turn back..hahas..nvm lahz..i wondered how stanley make her till she so faithful 2 him..? hahas..stanley say go where she dun dare 2 say dun go de..hahas..wow..pro..hahas..actually stanley also very pro hor?? hahas..nvm lahz..also not her fault..she got her own things 2 do mahz..very busy de hor..?? hahas..now she no hp..so...nvm..hahas..she thinks of the past wif lin wei..hahas..mi also kapo 1 2 noe..wahahas..hope next time she can share her memory wif mi bax..can mahz?? hahas..hope she happy ba..heng in choir still got lin wei 2 pei her..good lor..hahas..mi got zhe yue..dun jealous wors..my zhe yue can pinch de..ur lin wei so skinny cant pinch..wahahahas..k lah..later i say him..u bu shuang..hahas..give u face cai dun say de hor..hahas..shiit must grow taller..cai got gers 1..wahahas...hope mi got ppl want ba..hahas..bleax..( cia..next time must tell mi ur memorys of u n lin wei de..can mah..? dun be selfish lahz..must share wors..wahahhas..anyway good luck!)

AwWw..sian..tired after i came back from scouts..wah..dame tiring..haiz..hahas..2day late 4 scouts..hahas..kanna pump 50 times..heng ar..i still fit..can do..wahahahas..just kiddin..i do untill i cant ta han ar..hahas..after tat my hand like lost feelin then very weak..again..PUMPIN again..then i was like even 1 pumpin i also cant do le cuz dame weak..after tat..i swear tat i would not cum 4 scouts the next week..hahas..kept wonderin if she has gone n dun dare 2 msg her cuz anyway she not gonna reply my msg..hahas...nvm lahz..heng..zhe yue got go..i felt better being wif zhe yue..hehez..he so good..we like slack the whole day..hahas..then i found tat my wallet has gone!! i quickly ran 2 the canteen 2 find cuz i noe i left it there..then could not find..hahas..got zhe yue 2 pei mi find..hahas..actually i noe i could not find it any more..but mi n zhe yue still contiune "kei kei" search..hahas..cuz we 1 2 have a break mahz..then tok 2 wan ting..hahas..she stead wif a guy call mark?? hahas..so funny..then mi n zhe yue jiu tease her..she was like pai sei then jiu..*SMACK* wow..she smack on my back..sooo pain..so i use ice 2 shoot her head..hahas..kindd of fun..then later she jiu kick my but..hahas..let her go this time..next time she die ar..hahas..ask stupid question from her..abt she n the mark de..then she dun 1 say..hahas..actually find it fun 2 tok 2 her..she some times make mi feel like i have some around mi..n she make mi have fun..hahas..anyway..thanx..! hahas..saw mathew march.hahahas.. like SAI ar..hahas..he like so "chi dun" dun noe wat 2 do..hahas..cute ar..going home le..played soccer 4 a while wif zhe yue..dun felt loney 2day..ehez..thanx everyone who pei mi wors..*HUGHUGS* wahahas..reach home very tired dun 1 2 go out eat so called pizza 2 eat..wah..shhhoooccck ar! haven eat tat 4 a long time..then was like dame hungry..hahas..sunddenly somebody msg mi..wow..surprise tat she msg mi 1st..hahas..kkz lah..my show start liao..buai..! (thanx everyone who pei mi 2day wors..zhe yue..especially ZHE YUE..hahas..1 a kiss from mi mahz..? hahas..)

2day was kind of sian..cuz i think later have 2 go 4 scouts..sian lahz..onli mi 1 person goin no 1 pei..no vin le..have 2 go my own from now on..hopin zhe yue would cum wif mi..but he was sleep sleepin like a pig..!! hahas...nvm lahz..actually 7.30 have 2 reach..but i think i going at abt 11+..hahas..bluff them say no 1 inform mi lorz..i'm going becuz of somebody called mi 2 go..then jiu go lorz..hahas..hoping 2 see her bax..i just read wat stan wrote..he say de saw something disgustin?? i think it means we 2 bax..but wat have we done..?? can u tell mi..? 2day in school was ok lah..kind of bored at 1st..no 1 2 pei mi..not like last time got vin n stan they all..but now..i "BU SI HAN" hahas..they dun 1 2 be mine fren..tats fine..i had sad be4..miss them be4 n tats enough le..hahas..just have 2 carry on wif my live wors..hahas..tell u i m a cheerful guy liao..hehez..dun play play hors..anyway..on english lesson tat time mi n wei jie had no group so we join cia's n joy's de group lor..anyway it was quite fun lahz..hahas..then promise stan 2 lend him my scouts uniform..kkz..so lend him lor..ltr he say i selfish..hahas..k lah..then draw n colour the picture wif cia..hahas..she hor..always cum "ji siao"..hahas..but it was quite fun..then after school..stayed in class 2 do our history project..wah..so many projects 2 do nowdays..but some time i m glad tat i have projects cuz at least there is some1 2 pei mi through the day..hahas..abt 3+ we went 2 joy's house 2 contiune our project..then jiu do n do n do..wah..so much 2 do..hahas..then abt 9+ we went home..so tired..going sleep liao..*tried*..kkz..buai..(hehez mat,joy,min N CIA..! thanx 4 all ur company 2day..*HUGS* 2 all of u..)

then nvm lor..so we took the same bus as them..but they treat us like invisible..tats good..hahas..then reached school le..when she tok 2 other ppl..she will always be smiling so happily..but when she turned n look at mi..wanted 2 tok..her face changed n will be very serious 2 mi..cant joke like in the past..i really wonded lots when i think of it..wat happened..? i really wanted 2 noe..haix..nvm llahz..maybe is becuz she felt "sian" tokin 2 mi le bax..how would i noe if u bottom very thing in ur heart..? but after tat..things get better..played water wif her..hahas..so wet sia..then got 1 more xtra came n play wif us..dun 1 2 mention..she poured her water at mi..cia called mi 2 go but i dun 1..nvm lah..make her happy abit lah..let her pour lah..hahas..actually..when i play wif cia tat time..she look cute wors..cuz onli at tat time a got a chance 2 speak 2 her happily..onli at tat time i got the chance 2 see her happy face..i noe after tat..2moro will be the same to see her sian sian face again..nvm..think something happened then she didnt 1 2 tell mi ba..hahas..then kept beggin mi not 2 pour le..but i still contiune..hahas..then she was like wanted 2 pour mi back cai will "fu qi"..then jiu even noe she 1 2 pour mi..i still let her pour lor..like tat she cai will be happier mahz..hhaas..then we all went off seprate ways..then was so loney walkin on the street..then saw ppl playin soccer so joined them..cant xpect stan,vin they all play wif mi le..so play myself lor..hahas..then shiit..!! 4got 2 bring back the board so walked back..heng..at least there is a good fren of mine..zhe yue..!! hahas..at least got his accompany..thanx..!! even i want some one less 2 pei mi..it seems impossible cuz she still need 2 have her own freedom mahz..hahas..so not blamin any1..onli hope she feel happy n dun think so much abt the past le lahz..noe it is hard 2 4get..but dun let it affect ur live k..? hehez..ya hor..u promise 2 "smile..always" hor?? better keep ur promise..hahas..k lahz..this few days we seems nothing 2 tok abt..maybe i m not the 1 who u can tok 2 le ba..hahas.. nvm..kkz..going do my history project liao..ltr kana scoldin from JOY again..hahas.. today ar..? erm okok lor..but was very tired n pek chek..cuz dame hot man..was peepin at her all the time..didnt wan her to noe..so when she was like turnin towards mi..i quickly turn back..so think i can onli secretly like her lorz..hahas...then saw her so sian sian like tat..wanted to ask her y? but didnt have the courage to..so drawn her a pic..then suddenly reminded mi of the past n i drew the..." coconut tree" 4 her again..tat tree was in the 1st pic i gave to her..wonder if she remembered..think not bax..mayb she even had thrown tat piece of rubbis away..haix..nvm.. after school go to compass to have lunch..then wentto desmond house..cuz didnt wan to go home so early..then we was like tokin abt our primary school..then tok abt "ming hui" hahas..last time i had a crush on her mahz..but still i didnt like her so much as telicia lahz..then when we wer going home...we saw HER..! today saw her at the bus stop..it should be a happy thing to see her u noe..but things are diffenet now..haix..now..think i'm no longer so close to her le bax..mi also dun noe y suddenly will turn till like this..really dun noe..haix..nvm lahz...just be urself lor..anyway happy jiu hao le..things have really changed..haix..changed a lot..haix..nvm have to try to let go..anyway no one cares..no one..even if i 1 2 find some1 to tok to..there is no 1 out there 4 mi..not the same as last time le..where there is vincent to tok to..where there is..cia to tok to... haix..but nvm..hehez..mi already told my mom to change school 4 mi..i say tat it is hard to get to school..so she say she will try 2 change 4 mi..but she say surlly no school want mi de cuz my result so lan..nvm..anyway just have to try..if not..i will never be able to 4get her..whenever i m angry wif her..i will be happy again once she smile to mi..whenever i m sad..once i see her smile..i 4get all the troubles.. maybe tats y i like her so much bax..hehez..pai sei le..but now neh..? hardly tok to her le bax..just dun noe wat happen..dun noe...(no ones noe my feelin cuz i put a smile on my face every day)

today went to plazar sin to watch movie..wif darren n zhe yue onli..hahas..watched "sisters" we 3 big boys watch untill like ah guas..hahas..keep putin our finger into our ears..hahas..then the zhe yue n darren was cute..hahas..the show was scary to us..when we came out from the movie..they keep on blamin mi 4 introducin them a scary show..hahas..haix..actually wanted to call cia go but she surlly wun go de..so never call lor..nvm lahz..she has her own life bax..then call mat he also dun 1..hahas..after show we jiu go home le..cuz nothing 2 do mahz..in the movie..mi keep throwin pop-corns all over zhe yue n darren..hahas..then suddenly thought of how i grabed a bunch of pop-corns n push into telicia's mouth..hahas..tat time was a happy memory 4 mi..haix..nvm..sended her msg..she didnt reply..hahas..sorri lahz..my msg to irritatin liao..hahas..then wan ting msg mi ask mi some question..then was like didnt 1 2 tell her so jiu kei kei tok abt another thing..hahas..these few days..i'm tryin not to bother her too much..try to reduce my msg 4 her..cuz i nod some thing has changed n not like in the past..haix..so talked to everyone..everyone..to try not to think of other things..then tok to my cousins..my frens..hahas..even WAN TING..hahas..but it is quite fun too..at least there is some1 to tok 2..hahas..meetin my cousin some days wif her frens..hahas..wanted to see some of her frens tat she mention..hahas..got 1 is very er xin 1 but his gf is pretty..hahas..no taste..should introduce to mathew..hahas..(noe u have ur own life..ur own happiness..n..ur own prince..good luck..)
